MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the LL30 Postcode area of LLandudno. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown following reports of faulty electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.57AM on 31st March 2021.
